DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate different resistive co-contraction training effect knee strength recovery ACL reconstruction . Participants divide three group . Group 1 receive standard ACL rehabilitation 8 week co-contraction training open kinetic chain position , Group 2 receive standard ACL rehabilitation 8 week co-contraction training open kinetic chain position Group 3 ( control group ) receive standard ACL rehabilitation .
DOC.brief_title: Resistive Co-contraction Training After Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction
DOC.detailed_description: Co-contraction training enhance joint stability via improve proprioceptive ability stimulates muscle activity injury and/or surgery . The participant assign different group one month surgery . They receive 8-week-treatment . Isometric strength quadriceps hamstring muscle measure first , third sixth month surgery . Concentric eccentric strength quadriceps hamstring muscle measure sixth month surgery .
DOC.criteria: ACL reconstruction hamstring autograft start PT program within one week surgery Revision surgery serious cartilage damage and/or cartilage repair ACL reconstruction allograft patellar tendon graft Having systemic and/or neurological problem
